verses.name: 2 Samuel 16:12
verses.text: It may be that the Lord will look on mine affliction, and that the Lord will requite me good for his cursing this day.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 16:13
verses.text: And as David and his men went by the way, Shimei went along on the hill’s side over against him, and cursed as he went, and threw stones at him, and cast dust.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 16:14
verses.text: And the king, and all the people that were with him, came weary, and refreshed themselves there.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 16:15
verses.text: And Absalom, and all the people the men of Israel, came to Jerusalem, and Ahithophel with him.
